title: Kizuna: Koi no kara Sawagi (Kizuna: Much Ado About Nothing)
synopsis: On his first day of junior high, Kei Enjoji fell in love at first sight. His heart was immediately captured by the gorgeous Ranmaru Samejima, a young kendo prodigy, and the two slowly formed a deep romantic bond. Now adults and living happily together as a couple, things seem to be going well for Ranmaru and Kei.
staff: [['Yamazaki, Kazuo', ['Director']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Kodaka, Kazuma', ['Original Creator']], ['Nishiyama, Shigeru', ['Editing']]]
